aboutMe.subtitle: Who I Am
aboutMe.description: Hi, I'm a luxemburgish and german speaking Frontend Developer based in Luxembourg. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
aboutMe.location: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Munich and remotely.
aboutMe.mindset: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
aboutMe.profession: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

skillSet.subtitle: Technologies
skillSet.title: Skill Set
skillSet.description: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
skillSet.a: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.text:
Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with
projects to see my skills in action.
projects.joinDescription: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.sharkieDescription: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

form.text1: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
